item.title: Richard's fried chicken recipe
item.description: Why fried chicken ğŸ”—Come on, man. What is the definition of good fried chicken ğŸ”— Looking good (golden shell outside) Juicy inside Chicken meet has strong mixed and balanced taste even deep inside Raw materials ğŸ”— Chicken leg, thigh, breast, or whatever you like. Oil (A LOT) Seasoning: Sea salt (if you do not have sea salt then normal salt) Chinese 13 Spices Mix (ç‹å®ˆç¾©åä¸‰é¦™) Curry power Mixed Italian herbs Soy sauce Dark soy sauce Egg Self-raising flour (ä¸­ç­‹é¢ç²‰+å°‘é‡æ³¡æ‰“ç²‰) Black pepper (optional) Garlic (optional) Ginger (optional) Process ğŸ”—Curing ğŸ”— Wash all the chicken first and dry the extra water, put all the chicken in a big bowl.
